skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.EnhanceResourceProduction
skill.description:
To enhance the production of a set of given resource nodes.
When several nodes should be visited, the agent acts on each node by following the order of the elements into the 'resourceNodes' list. If a resource node is localized in a non accessible urban block, agent stays outside the urban block and enacts anyway.

parameter.name: resourceNodes
parameter.description: The resource nodes to enact on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be definitely added to each node production.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: enhanceProduction
link.description: To enact the decision to "enhance" the production of the issued node.

feedback.name: enhanced
feedback.description: Sent once a resource node production have been enhanced.
